title: Our Team
subtitle: Mentors and innovators collaborating to grow startups and future leaders.
description: At NovaNest, we believe that success is not just the result of great ideas — it’s the outcome of a shared synergy among people who move forward with energy, experience, and faith in the future. Our team is a dynamic blend of mentors, core members, and trainees who collaborate, learn continuously, and support startups on their journey toward growth and success. We believe that when the knowledge, experience, and connections of mentors merge with the energy, creativity, and innovation of the new generation, the best results are achieved.

people.name: Rasoul Moradimehr
about: Dr. Moradimehr is an experienced entrepreneur and investor with more than a decade of expertise in business development, investment, and startup leadership. He began his professional journey in Iran, where he founded and managed several successful ventures that provided him with valuable knowledge in entrepreneurship and innovation. Among his most notable initiatives are the founding and management of Landa Investment Holding, the creation of the Landa Business Academy to empower young talents, and the establishment and leadership of the Forough Knowledge-Based Accelerator.

In addition, Rasoul served as Chairman of the Board of Farazman, where he played a key role in building strong connections between academia and industry, and forged partnerships with international universities and educational institutions. He was also the pioneer of the “Education Through Travel” model in Iran, an innovative approach that combined learning with real-world experiences and exploration.
Throughout his career, Rasoul Moradimehr has collaborated with numerous successful international startups, gaining invaluable experience in scaling ventures globally.
After moving to Canada, he launched Novanest Venture, a firm dedicated to supporting startups and international entrepreneurs through investment, acceleration, and advisory services.
Under his leadership, Novanest Venture focuses on:
• Investing in and accelerating early-stage and growth-stage startups
• Delivering specialized services within the Canada Start-up Visa Program
• Advising and supporting international entrepreneurs entering the Canadian market
• Designing and implementing provincial entrepreneurship programs
• Establishing the Novanest Business Academy to inspire and empower teenagers in entrepreneurship

Rasoul Moradi Mehr strongly believes that combining his past experiences with new opportunities in Canada can create a powerful platform for innovation, economic growth, and building a brighter future for the next generation of entrepreneurs.

people.name: Majid Soltanzadeh
about: Dr. Majid Soltanzadeh, widely known as “Dr. Stress,” is an Industrial-Organizational Psychologist, professional coach, and international trainer whose primary mission is to help people transform stress into a positive driving force for growth and success. He is the founder and CEO of the international Dr. Stress Group, an organization operating in both Iran and Canada, focused on education, consulting, personal coaching, and organizational development.

Dr. Soltanzadeh’s professional journey is a blend of academic expertise and over two decades of practical experience. His background includes business management, strategic planning, marketing, sales, human resources, and personal development. As a coach and consultant, he has worked with numerous entrepreneurs, business owners, and managers, guiding them toward higher performance, emotional balance, and professional clarity. He strongly believes in the concept of “positive stress,” a transformative idea at the core of his personal brand — the belief that stress can be harnessed as energy, motivation, and creativity.

His media presence and educational activities have played a significant role in making him a recognizable figure. Dr. Soltanzadeh regularly appears in workshops, seminars, radio interviews, and digital platforms, where he explains stress management, mindfulness, and self-improvement in a simple, practical, and engaging way. His storytelling, especially about his immigration journey and the creation of the “Dr. Stress” brand, has helped him build a genuine connection with his audience.

Beyond his psychological and coaching work, Dr. Soltanzadeh is also passionate about art and practices calligraphy professionally — a reflection of his creative and calm personal identity. The color yellow, symbolizing joy, energy, and optimism, has become a key element of his brand identity and is present throughout his visual content.

Today, Dr. Majid Soltanzadeh is recognized as an influential figure in mental well-being, personal development, and coaching. He continues to guide individuals and organizations toward building a more peaceful, purposeful, and successful life.
• Business & Life Coaching
• Leadership & Decision-Making Development
• Stress Management & Personal Resilience
• Strategic Thinking & Career Planning
• Communication & Emotional Intelligence (EQ)
• Personal Branding & Professional Growth

people.name: Arvin Radan
about: Arvin is an international scholar, researcher and energy expert with more than 20 years of cross-functional work experience in academia and industry in the Middle East, Europe, and North America. He is currently the R&D director at A&H Engineering Ltd. and the president and CEO at Radinsight Consulting Co.

Arvin holds a PhD degree in Power Electronics and Electric Drives from the Technical University of Munich, Germany, one US patent and three US and Canadian pending patents and has authored one book and co-authored more than 70 articles in the peer-reviewed international journals and conference proceedings. He is a certified energy manager and creates seed documents for new standards for CSA.

Arvin was a board member of the Association of Iranian Engineers of BC, co-founder and vice president of the Iranian Wind Energy Association, co-founder and treasurer of the Power Electronics Society of Iran and an associate professor at K.N.Toosi University of Technology for many years. He co-initiated the international IEEE annual PEDSTC conference and served at its organizing committee for three years. He also served as VP of membership, VP of education and President of the Presidents’ Distinguished Talk of the Town Toastmasters Club in Coquitlam.

Arvin’s areas of expertise are energy efficiency and policy, power conversion and variable frequency drive systems, power quality assessment and mitigation. He is an active article reviewer of ISI journals and a senior member of IEEE. Arvin is an active hiker, an environmental activist and a supporter of youth programs.
Under his leadership, Novanest Venture focuses on:
• R&D Director at A&H Engineering Ltd. and President & CEO at Radinsight Consulting Co.
• PhD in Power Electronics and Electric Drives (Technical University of Munich)
• Holder of one US patent and three US/Canadian pending patents; author and co-author of numerous peer-reviewed articles and a book
• Former board member and co-founder roles (Association of Iranian Engineers of BC, Iranian Wind Energy Association, Power Electronics Society of Iran); former associate professor
• Co‑initiated the international IEEE PEDSTC conference and served on its organizing committee; leadership roles in Toastmasters (VP membership, VP education, President)
• Expertise in energy efficiency & policy, power conversion & variable frequency drive systems, and power quality assessment & mitigation
• Senior member of IEEE and active reviewer for ISI journals
• Active hiker, environmental activist, and supporter of youth programs
